subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A loss to the Trail Blazers was the eighth straight for the Knicks (5-28), who had just nine available players to start the game and then lost Anthony for the second half because of a sore left knee.
snippet: A loss to the Trail Blazers was the eighth straight for the Knicks (5-28), who had just nine available players to start the game and then lost Anthony for the second half because of a sore left knee.
